original_text: And thou shalt put all in the hands of Aaron, and in the hands of his sons; and shalt wave them for a wave offering before the Lord.
korean_text: 그 전부를 아론의 손과 그의 아들들의 손에 주고 그것을 흔들어 여호와 앞에 요제를 삼을지며

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt put all in the hands of Aaron,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 모든 것을 아론의 손에 두고

sentences.original_text: and in the hands of his sons;
and shalt wave them for a wave offering
